column1: We are thinking of visiting Panama in November. It looks like the sargassum seaweed epidemic has hit all across the Caribbean. Can anyone say if Panama and the Bocas del Toro area have been spared?
there is no problem here in Bocas the beaches like red frog, zapatilla and luff are beautiful.
